title: Khumba
description: A half-striped zebra is blamed for the drought and leaves his herd in search of his missing stripes. He is joined on his quest by an overprotective wildebeest and a flamboyant ostrich; they defeat the tyrannical leopard and save his herd.

reviews.text: My kids love this movie, very entertaining and fun, it teaches the values ​​of friendship and has a nice message about cultural diversity and the importance of accepting your differences. I recommend the movie for children 3-8 years old, will love it.

I really love this animated film, of course is doesn't best film, but all of us give a big lesson be tolerantly people that's why I give movie 10. Really entertaining, recommend for all ages of people!
The movie's plot is interesting, and the voice acting is good.It falls a little off,just a smudge, evan though it is meh, there still is some good parts.
